thread.title: BRIEF-Morgan Stanley Income Securities Announces Approval Of Reorganization

title: BRIEF-Morgan Stanley Income Securities Announces Approval Of Reorganization

organizations.name: brief-morgan stanley income securities announces approval of reorganization april

text:
April 20, 2018 / 8:34 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Morgan Stanley Income Securities Announces Approval Of Reorganization Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - Morgan Stanley Income Securities Inc : 
* MORGAN STANLEY INCOME SECURITIES INC. ANNOUNCES APPROVAL OF REORGANIZATION 
* MORGAN STANLEY INCOME SECURITIES INC - TRANSACTION IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO CLOSE ON OR ABOUT JUNE 4, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
